Today in County Clare, surf is looking good with 5 ft @9s W swell and light 7 mph S winds. Doolin Point and Lahinch Beach are prime spots, especially during their best tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions ramp up with 13 ft @14s W swell, but expect fresh 12 mph S winds, making for some powerful surf. Day after, the swell remains strong at 13 ft @13s W, but the wind picks up to 18 mph W, likely making it blown out. Best: today.
